thread.title: Re: ‘Get used to it’? Howard Dean reminds Trump who’s going to ‘soon run America’

author: Resist Liberal Fascism
title: Re: ‘Get used to it’? Howard Dean reminds Trump who’s going to ‘soon run America’
text:
‘Get used to it’? Howard Dean reminds Trump who’s going to ‘soon run America’ Posted at 9:07 am on February 03, 2017 by Doug P. 
This morning, President Trump slammed the people who rioted in Berkeley Wednesday night: 
Former Vermont governor and Democrat presidential nominee Howard Dean responded this way: 
That could almost be seen as an in-kind donation to Trump’s re-election campaign.
